Game.Name: Wallaby!! - Usagi no Kuni no Kangaroo Race (Japan)
Game.plot: Wallaby!! Usagi no Kuni no Kangaroo Race is a Strategy game, developed by Tenky and published by NCS,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: Enter The Password ScreenAt the title screen, highlight "Continue", hold Select and press I.
Game.Notes: Wallaby!! is a racing simulation game from Tenky and Masaya. It plays similarly to a number of horse racing simulators for Japanese systems, but switches the horses for kangaroos and wallabies and human riders for rabbits. The player selects a rabbit as their protagonist and can either raise marsupials for racing or simply bet on those belonging to other rabbits.
